title: Fix hex value format error in call to :shh/send-direct-message
body:
[comment]: # (Please replace ... with your information. Remove < and >)

### User Story

Unexpected errors appear on the log in Status Desktop (see `:send-status-message-error` line on Logs section)

### Description

[comment]: # (Feature or Bug? i.e Type: Bug)
*Type*: Bug

14:33:29.869 - D - ubuntu-server err:  "ERROR [status-im.events:1033] - :send-status-message-error Error: invalid argument 0: json: cannot unmarshal hex string without 0x prefix into Go struct field NewMessage.pubKey of type hexutil.Bytes"

The error seems to be in `:shh/send-direct-message`, but maybe there are other locations.

[comment]: # (Describe the feature you would like, or briefly summarise the bug and what you did, what you expected to happen, and what actually happens. Sections below)
*Summary*: ...

#### Expected behavior
[comment]: # (Describe what you expected to happen.)

The format of the hex value passed to Go should be fixed so that the error doesn't occur anymore. 


### Additional Information
[comment]: # (Please do your best to fill this out.)
* Status version: ...
[comment]: # (Android or iOS.)
* Operating System: Desktop

#### Logs

```
14:33:29.686 - D - ubuntu-server std:  "DEBUG [status-im.ui.screens.navigation:80] - :navigate-to :home\nDEBUG [status-im.transport.filters:21] - :add-filter {:topics [\"0xf8946aac\"], :privateKeyID \"0x04325367620ae20dd878dbb39f69f02c567d789dd21af8a88623dc5b529827c2812571c380a2cd8236a2851b8843d6486481166c39debf60a5d30b9099c66213e4\", :allowP2P true}"

```
@PombeirP when does this occur, do you have repro-steps?

@cammellos it happens every time I sign in to an account. Attaching a recent log from Desktop where it happened 3 times.

[Status.log](https://github.com/status-im/status-react/files/2549388/Status.log)
This happens when I'm on the Ropsten-RPC net whenever I send a chat message.
@bhauman are you also on desktop? if you switch to mainnet does it give you the same issue?

@cammellos OK this only happens when I'm in "Development Mode" and it happens on mainnet_rpc and ropsten_rpc.

I'm on an IOS simulator

Thanks @bhauman, 

would you mind changing:
https://github.com/status-im/status-react/blob/c3ad0a7b219e2c44fe466b045fcb266eb17d95c2/src/status_im/transport/message/protocol.cljs#L85
to 
https://github.com/status-im/status-react/blob/f25e41fd98d25206252f722a2c78c748921a76eb/src/status_im/transport/message/protocol.cljs#L85

and see if it still throws an error?

That change has been missed in a recent refactoring PR and might be the cause of the error.
Thanks!
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.

@cammellos I see that the same code still exists in https://github.com/status-im/status-react/blob/develop/src/status_im/group_chats/core.cljs#L444, although `current-public-key` doesn't seem to be used anymore. Should we just delete that line?
GitHub
status-im/status-react
a free (libre) open source, mobile OS for Ethereum - status-im/status-react
oh yes, that needs removing, thanks
